description: The move to close schools on Monday, due to the pandemic, was voted down by politicians.
title: Covid: Early school closure proposals rejected
title_page: Covid: Early school closure proposals rejected - BBC News
maintext: The education minister can only close the schools after consulting with the Council of Ministers, be satisfied the move is "necessary and proportionate" and obtaining the consent of the health and social services minister, who must have consulted the medical officer of health.
